sentences.en: Another man constantly chain-smoked and seemed to have the shakes.
sentences.cn: 另一名男子一直一支接一支地抽烟，似乎身体有些发抖。

sentences.en: Both quantum mechanics and chaos theory suggest a world constantly in flux.
sentences.cn: 量子力学和混沌理论都表明世界永远处于不断变化中。

sentences.en: He developed a nervous twitch and began to blink constantly.
sentences.cn: 他身体出现了神经性抽搐，开始不停地眨眼睛。

sentences.en: He is being constantly monitored with regular checks on his blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 他被实时监测，定时量血压。

sentences.en: He is constantly on guard against any threat of humiliation.
sentences.cn: 他时刻提防着任何有辱尊严之事。

sentences.en: He talked constantly about his work.
sentences.cn: 他不断地谈到他的工作。

sentences.en: He's constantly on the phone to his girlfriend being soppy.
sentences.cn: 他总是卿卿我我地跟女朋友煲电话粥。

sentences.en: I was constantly ill, with a baffling array of symptoms.
sentences.cn: 我一直病着，出现了一系列让人不解的症状。

sentences.en: I was working all hours and constantly fretting about everyone else's problems.
sentences.cn: 我一刻不闲地工作，总是为别人的事操心。

sentences.en: If you smoke then the whole respiratory system is constantly under attack.
sentences.cn: 如果抽烟，整个呼吸系统就会一直受到损害。

sentences.en: John was constantly reassuring me that we were meant to be together.
sentences.cn: 约翰不断安慰我说，我们注定要在一起。

sentences.en: She was constantly on the phone, ladling out inside details to reporters.
sentences.cn: 她经常打电话向记者们提供大把内幕消息。

sentences.en: Sooner or later he may tire of constantly putting himself last.
sentences.cn: 迟早他会厌倦总是把自己排在最后。

sentences.en: The English language is constantly changing .
These machines are constantly updated by improving the design of the computers.
sentences.cn: 通过改善计算机的设计，这些机器不断得到更新。

sentences.en: We are constantly being reminded to cut down our fat intake.
sentences.cn: 不断有人提醒我们要减少脂肪的摄入量。

sentences.en: You've constantly got to keep on at people about that.
sentences.cn: 你总是得没完没了地和别人说那件事。

trans.tran_cn: 不断地，时常地，始终，一直
trans.tran_en: all the time, or very often
